projects.name: e-commerce-project
projects.label: E-commerce website - WIP
projects.description: Current project I'm working on. It's a multi page e-commerce application written with React (routing with React Router), using the Firebase (to enhance my full stack knowledge). So far it contains fully responsive pages: landing page, shop page, checkout page and the register & login page with an option of google sign in (user authentication is made with the Firebase and user data is stored in the Firestore). Plans to add: contact page content and also the payment using the Stripe API.

projects.name: react-currency-converter
projects.label: React Currency Converter
projects.description: A single page application written with the React in functional programming like approach. It uses the exchanged rates API.

projects.name: hacker-news-search-app
projects.label: Hacker News Search
projects.description: A single page application (SPA) to search articles made with the React that uses the hacker news API. Styles written with tailwind css framework.

projects.name: portfolio
projects.label: Personal Portfolio
projects.description: The project for this website. It's written with the React and the TypeScript in functional programming like approach. The mobile-first approach is used for the styles.

projects.name: halloween-gallery
projects.label: Halloween gallery
projects.description: Fully responsive single page website with gallery example. It's made with plain JavaScript in functional programming like approach, and the styles with the mobile-first approach.

projects.name: 3d-print-toolbox-modified
projects.label: Modified 3D Print Toolbox
projects.description: Blender 3d addon with utilities for 3d printing. It's based on existing built-in addon, the '3D Print Toolbox'. This expanded version has more flexibility and influence on the mesh cleanup settings.

projects.name: login-register-system
projects.label: Login and Register System
projects.description: Login and Register System written in OOP PHP and MySQLi. It was made as a school project.
